snippet: The music-streaming service is being sued by BMI, a giant licensing agency, which wants a higher cut of Pandora’s revenue. The trial begins next week.
abstract: Pandora and BMI are preparing for legal fight over music royalties that will determine how much Internet radio service pays licensing agency's clients to stream their songs; case is being closely watched by both music industry and Justice Dept due in part to struggle Pandora has had with revenue due to costs of its music licenses.
lead_paragraph: The music-streaming service is being sued by BMI, a giant licensing agency, which wants a higher cut of Pandora’s revenue. The trial begins next week.

headline.main: Pandora Readies for Another Royalties Battle, This Time With BMI
headline.print_headline: Pandora Readies for Another Royalties Battle, This Time With BMI

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: American Society of Composers, Authors and Publishers
